Health - Medical Terminology for entire 3 weeks

A huge thank you to Madyson Lawson for designing the t-shirt and for Carla Lawson, our entire staff, wonderful students and families for helping by selling and purchasing our Healing for Hibbard t-shirts. Today we were pleased to present the Hibbard family (Gerald Baker - Stepdad)Â with a check for $2986.00 to help with medical expense. Â Thank you to our Knox community and Corbin Independent School District, as well! Shirts are on sale through tomorrow. Keep praying ...#HealingforHibbard #NoTigerFightsAlone
